alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 11:25PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A line of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jefferson, west central Lewis and northeastern Oswego Counties through 1230 AM EDT... At 1125 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorms 10 miles northwest of Stony Point, or 25 miles northwest of Sandy Island Beach State Park, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Watertown, Sandy Island Beach State Park, Fort Drum, Stony Point, Pulaski, Clayton, Adams, Dexter, Redfield, Glen Park, Selkirk Shores State Park, Mexico Point State Park, Adams Center, Cedar Point State Park, Southwick Beach State Park, Henderson Harbor, Barnes Corners, Nine Mile Point, Richland and Sackets Harbor. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 34 and 49. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this line of storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This line of storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
